comments.body: These commented-out dependencies are recent additions, not yet in a release.

Aha! Sorry, should have been paying attention to the release, not master.
At least they are nicely teed up for next release :wink:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@    - simplegeneric >0.8
# These are listed in the setup.py, but do not cause the build tests to fail.
# In order to enable these dependencies, additional tests will need to be defined.
#    - decorator
#    - prompt_toolkit >=0.60
